column4: Hello, I need you help here. I'm french and I don't know what is the right expression to talk about the index you found at the end of a book that containt a list of keyword and at which page it's referenced into the book.
you got the name right, an index
a glossary lists the word definitions, an index is a list with page references
ok .. then it's an index.  Anybody know a good tool to create this kind of index ?
